user_description.ru: Ты в портупее — ремешки на голом теле, металлические кольца и цепочки. Он смотрит на тебя.
user_description.en: You're in a harness — straps on naked body, metal rings and chains. He watches you.

ai_description.ru: Портупеи, харнессы, body chains в стиле Maison Close. Ремешки, металл, украшения на теле. Визуальный акцент без скрытия.
ai_description.en: Harnesses, body chains, Maison Close style. Straps, metal, body jewelry. Visual accent without covering.

image_prompt: woman wearing black leather harness over naked body, metal rings and straps across chest and hips, man watching her from bed, bedroom with dim lighting

text.en: What appeals about wearing a harness?
